title: Genome and Envirome: Roles and Interaction in Psychiatric Epidemiology
abstract: The VIII Congress of the International Federation of Psychiatric Epidemiology (IFPE) will be held under this title at the International Conference Centre of the Academia Sinica in Taipei, Taiwan, 6â€“9 March 1999. The scientific programme will cover, in addition to the title theme, a variety of other topics. The official languages of the Congress will be English and Chinese.
